en.Title: Accept mobile money througt wihout internet
en.description: Your business is not on the internet and you want to receive mobile money payments? It's possible! You can use QoS standard payment menu or we can build complex menu depending on your customers experiences

details.name: Access to Dashboard
details.text: Ours APIS are build to be supported by many techonlogies such as PHP, Laravel, Django & Ajax, javascript and wordpress woocommerce.

en.subTitle1: Simple USSD flow for end users
